name: Wally Holt
text:
Awesome reasonably priced buffet that truly has something for everyone!!

It's an old place so it's pretty banged up. It's mostly shown by the torn seat …More

name: Stewart Peterson
text:
Good pizza and chicken... excellent customer service (cook brought us chicken breasts once done cooking).
Salad bar has salad with walnuts so careful if not allergy

name: Kathleen Heck
text: Okay broasted chicken but the pizza isn't the best I have had. The buffet is pretty awesome if you or your company eats a ton. I love the salad bar and the chicken. Good place to take picky eaters (especially children) and for large groups.

name: Kitipong Jitramontree
text: Food is fresh, very good service, however our kids would rather go to the other location across the town because the place is bigger and has better food selections. This location is too small for the crowd that they get. I would recommend to finding a better location so they can handle the amount of guests they’re getting.

name: Courtney Ahlrichs
text: Good place!! But for the money it’s hard to go because they have a hard time keeping the food out for buffet!! Otherwise we love it!!

name: Lisa Woolison
text: Great salad bar with lots of choices. Pizza u can have them make what kind u want. Chicken is good too.

name: Chris Fonck
text: Depending on when you go to this Pizza Ranch, 3 stars are generous. The pizza bar is the smallest of any Pizza Ranch I've seen, and at times the pizza you request when checking in will be ready just about the time you're ready to leave. …More

name: Casey Stelken
text: My wife doesn't like chicken off the bone, so whenever we go to Pizza Ranch and the cashier asks us if we have any pizza requests for the buffet, my wife always asks for an order of chicken fries instead.  Some (not all) Pizza Ranch …More

name: Lee DeLoach
text: Owner/Manager is great! Can't beat the food for the price! We have eaten here often over the past 6 years we've lived here, and I think it's great that they help local youth sports teams fundraise.

name: Melissa
text: This location does not offer online ordering, which is disappointing.  The buffet is fairly modest.  There was almost always a wait for chicken and the three food stations were one sided(pizza, salad, and chicken/hot sides).  It doesn't …More

name: Stephen
text: Would have given this location zero stars if possible. The manager just wouldn't stop swearing. It may have been a bad day for her, but maybe she shouldn't take it out on people in front of customers.

name: Lucy Mills
text: This particular pizza buffet restaurant is barely noticed where it sits, off the main road in the back corner of a building with trees blocking the sign so a bit challenging to get to. The food is good here although slim selection -compared …More

name: Bailey Symonds
text: I actually worked here when I was 14. My family and I decided to order here, I honestly didn't expect much. We ordered pizza that ended up not being delivered correctly, Amy Jenkins sent the correct pizza out which is why I'm giving 5 …More

name: Jason Wibben
text: Pizza Ranch locations have good food. Their chicken is particularly good. But this location is absolutely awful. Pizza Ranch should be embarrassed by this location. Crappy and rude service, worn carpet, worn booths, dierry bathrooms, and …More

name: Ehren Van Auken
text: Good fast unlimited pizza.  Tastes great and they will make you a pizza if they don't have what you want on the buffet.

name: heather doyle
text: I'm not much of a pizza person but the chicken is fantastic! Just like my grandma used to make. The dessert pizza is awesome and the sides are pretty good too! Great place to eat with food that tastes homemade! 5 stars for me and my family!

name: Rick Cordes
text: Sevice was good.  The food was good.  The group sitting behind us was so noisy we could hear to visit among ourselves.

name: iaguy123
text: This location has the smallest buffet of any that I have been to, but the food is good. The broasted chicken is great. The small salad bar was not looking to good this trip, so only 4 stars. Their pizza is ok.

name: Hater
text: This place is so great that it's almost beyond words. They don't have the best pizzas in the world, but they are a pizza restaurant with a buffet! When you first come inside and order the buffet, they'll actually ask you if you want a …More

name: Tony K
text:
Some of the best restaurant chicken around.  Love the desert pizza too!

Edit: Boo why did you close this location?!?

name: Mike Frederick
text: Now under new owners and you can talk the difference. The buffet was well stocked and was constantly being refilled would definitely recommend especially if the last time you went was under the old owners.

name: Steve & Rosanne Hans
text: Friendly & accommodating staff, fresh & delicious food. The Tuscan Roma pizza is perfect on a wafer thin crust! And they don't rush you. Even with road construction, we'll be back!

name: Terany Drayfahl
text: The food honestly didn't taste bad but the service was horrible. The place was trashed and not a clean table in the house. Floor covered in food. The staff is all young kids and stand around socializing. After we left, I was up all night …More

name: Tobey Slagenweit-Coffman
text: It is a fun place to eat... The booths need some to... You have a choice between pizza buffet, salad bar, and southern food buffet... You can even get a special order pizza at no additional cost...

name: robert coker
text: They had a bigger and better variety of foods soft serve ice cream and soda selection than any other Pizza Ranch I've ever been too... The staff is very friendly and polite

name: Kaitlin Hankins
text: During my visit to pizza ranch I had a disappointing time at this particular location. The food was dried out from being out for quite awhile and there was not many options available. I have been to other locations and had wonderful dining but both times with the Marion location were subpar.

name: tony aguilar
text: This place always is either short staffed or short on items from the menu. It really needs some revamping before it can be considered a good restaurant to eat at.

name: Sam g
text: Great place to eat with friends especially if you have hungry teenagers!!

name: M Weiser
text: A nice mixture of pizzas and broasted Fried Chicken along with a salad bar and sides.

name: Jeff Timpe
text: Good stuff.  The terrible country music helped me eat more delicious chicken and dessert Pizza to punish my ears.

name: Vickie Sommers
text: Love the chicken. Great price good pizza buffet

name: Andy C
text: Their taco pizza is the best. The buffet is really good as well, but it is easy to over eat here!

name: Amanda Baych
text: Service was horrible. Waited at counter for about 5 mins for someone to come when they were slow. Men's bathroom was gross bugs on the floor. We asked for a special pizza for buffet and they didn't bring it to the table. Another table …More

name: Gail Nix
text: Always get full of good. Flavorful food.

name: jennifer konichek
text: We took the family there for supper after a long day of shopping. The food was cold. You could tell it sat on the buffet too long. I asked for a pizza to be made and it wasn't brought to our table like any other Pizza Ranch would do. I …More

name: Jennifer Elliott
text: Great broasted chicken, it's also nice that they ask if you want any particular pizza for their buffet.

name: Andre Miller
text: Great food fun times

name: Blossom GamingYT
text: I liked it but the only desert u get is vanilla ice cream

name: Calleen Randall
text: Grandson likes ice cream and pizza together

name: Carisa Driscoll
text: To go order Taco pizza did not have the ingredients as stated on their menu.  Also, when I arrived at the business another patron was basically picking the lock because it was obviously not working correctly based on the look of the door. …More

name: Micah Stickley
text: Great place. Service was amazing

name: Marcus Origer
text: Pizza was great. Sides and desserts could use some work.

name: Steve Reed
text: All you can eat at a reasonable price...food is decent...

name: Scott Groth
text: Awesome service and pizza!

name: Joshua Poitra
text: Good food, and very clean, not overly busy nor expensive.

name: Teresa Wethington
text: good little salad bar...friendly staff...ample seating...good selection of food & drinks

name: Becky Kopp
text: Excellent chicken...service good too

name: Sue Packard
text: Depends on time and etc on quality of food and service

name: Katie Lloyd
text: Everytime we go here the customer service is outstanding. You want something they dont have? They make it, pronto. People are friendly, food is good. Alot of the decor is torn up and i could care less because what matters is we are taken …More

name: Bill Woltz
text: Great pizza and really good fried chicken too!

name: David Haverkamp
text: AutoZone, They had the parts I needed.  Google seems to think I went to Pizza Ranch, and I can't edit the location.  Pizza Ranch is right next door.

name: Tim Burton
text: Good service and clean buffet..

name: Eric McElroy
text: Always a good place to eat. One of the only buffets I will go to.

name: Alicia M
text: The group room has lots of room and there was nice staff. The pizza selection was very poor, only about 5 types of pizza.

name: Roger Parry
text: Very good .The chicken was great.

name: Rod Miller
text: Over priced for the value received.

name: David Barnhart
text: Good food, fair price.

name: Allison Kremer
text: Awesome food and amazing seating

name: Brad Aeschliman
text: It was never great but was worth at least 3 stars. Over the last year it has really seemed to drop off the deep end.  Food and service has suffered the most.  I would not recommend this place to anyone

name: Anna Gadient
text: The pizza was so disagsting my younger brother didn't even eat it and he eats anything It was the worse food at pizza ranch I have ever tasted the chicken was greaser than Casey's pizza we used 7 napkins and it was still grease I would not recommend this to anyone

name: Ed Harper
text: Good pizza and chicken.   Staff very friendly, ans vwry, clean

name: Arielle Conner
text: Don't go here, we just had lunch here and from the moment I left my stomach was upset. Not even 6 hrs later, I'm throwing up from food poisoning. Haven't eaten anything else since we were there and now I can't enjoy my work trip because I'm alternating between throwing up and being curled up in bed in my hotel. Disappointed.

name: Aaron Luna
text: It's a pizza buffet, so it's nothing special. Great place to take the kiddo.

name: Tomas Foley
text: Great experience here food was fresh and tasty! Manager Gage was a big help to my party!

name: David Walker
text: Great, friendly people.  The buffet ran out a few times, but it was busy.

name: Paula M
text: Nice place for a quick lunch.

name: Way Toofazt
text: It's a pizza ranch. If you know the place you know the food. If not you can just come in.

name: Bob Bembenek

name: Ashley Kellenberger
text: Pizza and everything was so hot and fresh.

name: William Harman

name: Michael Porto
